analysis.description:
UHCToken.constructor (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#130-151) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-holders.push(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#140-141)

UHCToken.serviceClaimOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#209-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-holders.remove(owner) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#217)
	-holders.push(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#219)

UHCToken.backendRefund (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#291-308) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-holders.remove(_from) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#304-305)

UHCToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#332-369) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-holders.remove(_from) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#353-355)
	-holders.push(_to) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#356)
	-holders.push(accounts[_from].referer) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#364-365)

UHCToken.userMigration (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#427-431) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-holders.remove(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol)
	-holders.push(owner) (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol)
UHCToken.servicePause (/unique_chucks/20/0x87fe4ee2ed12c2582daf0c3829792004ffd1ff78.sol#181-186) should be declared external
